Data: 1.50pm Good afternoon everyone and it's straight into news from the SCG where Ricky Ponting has won the toss and Australia will have a bat against India.
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, 2 runs strayed down leg, turned round to deep fine leg with a quick tuck off the pads
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, 1 run on the legs once again and tucked round again but this time for a single, but Sreesanth will be encouraged by the swing he is finding

Sreesanth to Hayden, FOUR runs once again that's on the legs, Sreesanth struggling to find his line to the left handers, and Hayden booted that one off the hips with a firm push through backward square
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run much better line and causes Hayden some trouble there with one which pitches just outside and comes back so close to the forwrad-prodding edge
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run tucked up on leg, with one which pitches on a good length, Hayden squeezes down and out towards mid-on
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run swing back in to the left hander, tight line, and pushed out to mid-on without much power

Sharma to Gilchrist, FOUR runs over the wicket, short and wide and Gilchrist hits that very hard indeed, standing back and rocking a strong cut up and over backward point and it goes like lightning across the turf
Sharma to Gilchrist, 1 run better line and length, just on off, worked down off the back foot defensively rather than anything
Sharma to Hayden, 1 wide outside off, that swings a long way outside off as the batsman shoulders arms extravagantly
Sharma to Hayden, no run banged wide down the channel, again a big leave
Sharma to Hayden, no run nipped across him with some zig and no little zag, a testing length and the batsman shoulders arms as it goes down the channel
Sharma to Hayden, no run more of the same, and the batsman does well to leave it, too much of a good length
Sharma to Hayden, no run there must be a deliberate plan to bowl wide down the channel because there he goes again, once more left
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, FOUR runs banged in short and wide and cut hard through point to the ridiculously short boundary
Sreesanth to Gilchrist, FOUR runs Gilchrist goes again, outside off, and drilled hard on the front foot through cover

Sreesanth to Gilchrist, OUT what a ripper of a delivery and a good catch - nips it hard back in fro moutside off on a shortish length, Gilchrist jumps into the line and pushes through a nick off an inside edge, Dhoni dives far to his
Sreesanth to Ponting, 3 runs outside off, Ponting bissects the fielders at mid-off and cover with a firm push of a forward defence
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run shoulders arms there as the ball jags back a touch from outside off, Hayden quick to make sure to evade the ball
Sreesanth to Hayden, 1 run defended on the front foot this time, good line and length there
Sharma to Hayden, FOUR runs Hayden lifts the ball from outside off with a front-foot straight pull over mid-on
Sharma to Hayden, SIX runs short ball on middle and off, moving away, Hayden simply shoulders the ball all the way over midwicket, and that's rocketed flat
Sharma to Hayden, no run defended on the front foot now
Sharma to Hayden, no run a rearing bouncer outside off, Hayden goes for a big lash of a front foot wallop over mid-on and is nowhere near the ball
Sharma to Hayden, no run pushed up there on off, defended on the front foot
Sharma to Hayden, no run up there on off and defended forward once more
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run up there on off, defended quietly on the front foot
Sreesanth to Ponting, FOUR runs wide outside off and Ponting cuts hard off the back foot in front of point
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run just outside off, a good length, Ponting pushes into the covers defensively, Harbhajan shines the ball and returns it in
Sreesanth to Ponting, FOUR runs some room outside off and Ponting leaps on to it with a full-blooded cover drive from the middle of the bat
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run up there on off, Ponting jumps into the line and defends down on the back foot
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run width outside off, cut hard in the air over point
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run oh, nearly! A big dive from Rohit Sharma to his left at point as Ponting shapes to drive forward and takes a huge outside edge
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run outside off, cut into the covers
Sharma to Ponting, no run another good delivery troubles Ponting once more, the batsman coming outside off but the ball cuts back, he squares up and pops up a leading edge, safe
Sharma to Ponting, no run nipped back in again, Ponting comes forward and defends on the front foot
Sharma to Ponting, 2 runs pushed across him a bit too straight on middle and leg, Ponting clips well off the toes to midwicket
Sharma to Ponting, no run comes out on leg, and defends towards mid-on
Sreesanth to Hayden, FOUR runs drags it too short on off and Hayden disdainfully despatches it with a pull through square leg to bring up Australia's fifty from 37 balls
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run round the wicket and does well with one that pitches wide outside off and angles a touch back in after pitching
Sreesanth to Hayden, FOUR runs half-volley outside off and Hayden uses all his muscle to boost the ball up and over mid-on and it flies hard and on its way
Sreesanth to Hayden, 1 run nipped back in, pushed out to short midwicket
Sreesanth to Ponting, 4 leg byes an attempted yorker strays down leg, Ponting turns it off the pads - literally - and the appeal was more in hope than expectation
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run outside off, good length forces Ponting to adjust his shot and indeed check it into a forward defence
Sharma to Hayden, FOUR runs good length pushed across off, the batsman lashes an inside edge hard back towards his sticks and Ishant can't believe Hayden's not dragged that one back on
Sharma to Hayden, 1 leg bye straight, short and hustled round with a would-be pull, misses, the ball crashes on to his midriff
Sharma to Ponting, no run good length on off, defended back down off the back foot
Sharma to Ponting, FOUR runs overpitched on off and Ponting helps himself to a silken on-drive, just a push, and out it travels
Sharma to Ponting, no run outside off, pushed out to the covers
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run on middle and leg, driven out to mid-on
Pathan to Ponting, SIX runs short on off and that's a majestic shot from Ponting who lifts it off the back foot, swivelling round and smashing over square many rows back
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run on leg, turned off the toes through gully
Pathan to Hayden, 1 wide fired wide outside off, Hayden goes for the cut shot, crouching into it, but it flies past the base
Pathan to Hayden, no run wide again, cut into the ground outside off and it travels on to Irfan who snatches it
Pathan to Hayden, 2 runs hit across the line into deep midwicket with a forthright drive
Pathan to Hayden, 1 wide a wide again, Hayden coming out to again try to cut but the ball's through him. It's a fair call, the ball in line with marker
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run outside off, cut down into the covers, hardly firmly struck
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run strayed onto leg, turned behind square now
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run nips back in a touch from outside, driven to the covers
Sharma to Hayden, 2 runs pushed across him from over the wicket, Hayden gets into position and sets himself to cut through point
Sharma to Hayden, no run good ball, across him again, this time on a tighter line just outside off and on a good length
Sharma to Hayden, 1 run outside off and Hayden comes out of his crease to drive up to mid-on, just to say in front of Yuvraj who had plenty of time to take it but instead lets it pop into his knees
Sharma to Ponting, no run outside off, cut down to Sreesanth
Sharma to Ponting, FOUR runs outside off, short, and Ponting swivels the ball round from there through in front of midwicket, terrific shot, well balanced and weighted
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run starts well, quietening the batsman up in front of off, tight length and all Hayden can do is defend back off the back foot
Harbhajan to Hayden, 1 run outside off, pushed gently into the short midwicket region
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run on middle and leg, pushed into short midwicket off the back foot
Harbhajan to Hayden, 1 run outside off, pushed to mid-off
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run good bounce up to the batsman, the ball pitching back in to him and forcing him to defend off the back foot
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run on leg, turned round through the 45
Pathan to Ponting, no run right up there on a good length on off, pushed down quietly, in defence
Pathan to Ponting, no run right up there on off, a slower ball at 118kph, defended on the front foot
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run on leg, tight length, but turned down to fine leg
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run short ball, whipped round from in line with off to midwicket off the back foot
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run ah, short in front of the fielder at deep third man, Ponting going for the up and over cover, instead it lopoed up and round, bouncing in front of the fielder
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run outside off, worked into the covers this time
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run rolls his fingers on it a touch short, Hayden rocks back and forces hard to the covers where Gautam Gambhir does so well with a dive to his right
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run pushed on to the back foot, defended down
Harbhajan to Hayden, 1 run a good yorker, dug out to short midwicket with a dig of a press
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run plants this one on off now, driven out to mid-on for a gentle single
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run pushed across him, driven out off the back foot to cover, without much power
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run on middle, turned away on off, defended back down
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run outside off, a touch of width, cut hard behind point
Pathan to Hayden, no run driven forward on the front foot back to the bowler
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run on leg, turend round to square and there was a chance if he had hit from point
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run shortish on off, pushed out to the covers off the back foot
Pathan to Hayden, no run a hint of swing outside off, pushed into the covers on the front foot
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run dragged it short outside off, driven out to the covers again
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run fires in from over the wicket to outside off, cut down into the covers
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run outside off, and pushed forward into the ground
Harbhajan to Hayden, 1 run full delivery on middle, shuffled out to the covers for a quick single
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run a cramping delivery, full on off and forcing the batsman to come out and press right over the ball to snuff out any threat
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run down leg, turned round quietly to square
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run well bowled that time right up there on off, worked off the toes into short midwicket
Pathan to Hayden, no run curve wide outside off, cut hard to gully and taken well by Rohit Sharma with a dive to his right
Pathan to Hayden, no run on off, pushed on to the back foot and defended down
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run on middle, good line and the length's not bad, but it's driven out square to midwicket
Pathan to Ponting, no run fired in full and flat on middle, defended quietly on the front foot
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run outside off, pushed out to mid-off for a quick single
Pathan to Hayden, 1 run outside off, full delivery, Hayden drives hard back towards the bowler and the deflection crashes out to mid-on who picks it up easily
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run good loop on middle and off, pushed out to mid-off quietly
Harbhajan to Hayden, 1 run turns back in from outside leg and is brushed back out to square leg without much fuss
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run tight ball outside off, looks to try to squeeze it to short midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run turned off the legs to midwicket for a quick single
Harbhajan to Hayden, 2 runs forced well on a good length in line with leg, turned into short midwicket
Harbhajan to Hayden, no run driven out to mid-off this time
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run driven out straight to mid-off, the batsmen charge through
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run a quick drive to mid-on
Sreesanth to Hayden, no run on off, pushed forward with no alarm

Sreesanth to Hayden, no run a full toss slips out at hip height and the bowler gets away with it - close to being a no-ball - as the batsman hasn't got enough room to do much with it otehr than push to the covers
Sreesanth to Hayden, 1 run driven out to mid-off this time
Sreesanth to Ponting, 2 runs strayed down leg and Ponting's quick eyes help him react by pulling wristly through square
Sehwag to Hayden, 1 run on off, tucked off the legs square
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run a glide of a drive out wide of mid-on, Ponting taking that from outside off
Sehwag to Hayden, 2 runs on off, pushed to midwicket and they run well indeed
Sehwag to Hayden, 1 run turned square off the legs
Sehwag to Ponting, no run good loop outside off, turning away, the batsman comes over and out, and then defends
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run turns back in from outside off, and turned round out through fine leg where Sreesanth tidies up
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run well bowled, pushed up on a good length just outside off, the batsman respects the ball wirh a forward defence
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run waits on off and defends down off the back foot back towards the bowler
Sreesanth to Ponting, 2 runs tries the cutter at 102.9kph, Ponting waits and turns out to square leg
Sreesanth to Ponting, FOUR runs overpitched on off, and driven hard down the ground for a much-needed confidence boost of a fifty
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run yorker outside off, pushed out to mid-off
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run angled down on leg at a full length, Ponting digs out towards short midwicket
Sehwag to Hayden, no run defended back to the bowler from outside off
Sehwag to Hayden, 1 run down on one knee to meet a good-length ball and sweep it to midwicket

Sehwag to Ponting, OUT a bad mix-up there and Hayden's on his way after Ponting drove out to the covers, just wide of the fielder who picks up, turns, sets himself and throws back to Sehwag and Hayden's well out of his crease trying
Sehwag to Ponting, no run a good-length ball on off is met with a quiet defence
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run another mix-up to short midwicket and as Clarke runs to get back in his crease they take the single through an overthrow opportunity
Sehwag to Clarke, no run turned in from outside off, pushed out towards point with a checked shot
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run a touch too short and on middle and leg, the batsman gets over the ball and brushes out in front of square
Harbhajan to Clarke, no run comes out and defends on the front foot
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track to meet the ball outside off, driven out towards mid-on
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run driven out to mid-on
Harbhajan to Clarke, 2 runs on middle and leg, turned off the legs in front of square
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run moves back across his strumps to make room to drive out to mid-on
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run outside off and cut hard to deep point for a comfortable single
Pathan to Ponting, no run slower ball on off, defended forward given the decent length
Pathan to Ponting, 3 runs Ponting drives in the air, just over short cover, just enough bat on it to get over the man there
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run on the legs, flicked to backward square
Pathan to Ponting, no run driven out to the covers this time
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run on the legs, tucked out to short midwicket, and they scramble through the single
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run outside off, a short ball into the covers, Robin Uthappa gets the direct hit at the non-striker's but it ricochets off to allow them the overthrow
Sharma to Clarke, no run good length on off, driven out to mid-off
Sharma to Clarke, 2 runs outside off, tucks it round to midwicket for a comfortable single
Sharma to Clarke, no run pushed it in a good length and his height helped him get some steepling bounce, the ball jagging in off the seam and defended down well off the back foot
Sharma to Clarke, no run outside off, played down off the back foot to the gully region
Sharma to Clarke, 3 runs overpitches on off, Clarke drives out off the pads and there's some good running for three
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run the keeper's up by the way, full on off and driven to mid-off
Pathan to Ponting, no run pushed forward again
Pathan to Ponting, FOUR runs outside off, driven hard through the covers for a great shot
Pathan to Ponting, 3 runs wide outside off, cut hard off the base of the bat in the air up over to third man where Ishant does well with the slide and they get back for a well-run three
Pathan to Clarke, 1 run outside off again, cut hard into the ground and it runs down softly to third man now
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run on leg, turned out to short midwicket and they scramble through
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run low full toss on leg, driven out to mid-on easily
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run full toss again, driven out to mid-off
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run pushed a touch wide down off, the ball straightens and is cut out to point
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run on off, turned round off the legs behind square
Harbhajan to Clarke, 1 run outside off, driven hard to the covers, they race through the single
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run on off and middle, a slight risk as the batsman paddles the ball in front of the sticks round through the 45
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run bends it on to leg stump and it's brushed out to square leg
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run swivelled in on middle and leg, full, and defended on the front foot
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run outside off, waits on the back foot and drives back out to the covers
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run checks a drive back to the bowler
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run outside off, good length, Clarke forces a drive out to mid-off
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run pushed back to the bowler
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run up there on leg, driven out to wide mid-on
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run comes down the track to clip off the legs from in line with off
Sehwag to Clarke, no run on off, doesn't quite hold of a drive out to mid-on
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run an easy drive out to mid-on now
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run turned off the legs from in line with leg out to midwicket
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run Clarke backs away and pulls hard through midwicket
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run outside off, pushed out to short midwicket
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run backs away and waits on the back foot to carve out to the covers on the toes
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run steps out to drive to the covers
Yuvraj to Clarke, 2 runs outside off, width, cut hard through point and the fielder comes round to tidy up
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run turns in from outside off to middle, cut back out to the covers
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run driven out to the covers again
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run veers down leg and it's pulled round to square
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run flatbatted down the ground with an aerial swat out to long on
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run waits on the back foot and pushes out to mid-off
Sehwag to Ponting, no run defended this time
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run comes down the track to meet the ball on off and flicks out to midwicket, not quite getting hold of it, his back leg shooting up with the effort
Sehwag to Clarke, 1 run tucked out to mid-on now
Yuvraj to Clarke, 2 runs outside off, swept round behind square
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run swivelled in from outside off, driven back out straight without too much trouble or power
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run on off, good length, driven back out to mid-on, the score just ticking over now
Yuvraj to Clarke, no run outside off, turned out a touch, the batsman rocks back to give himself room to cut out
Yuvraj to Clarke, 1 run outside off, driven off the back foot into the covers
Yuvraj to Ponting, 3 runs down on one knee early, the ball dies on to leg and is swivel-swept round through fine leg
Sehwag to Ponting, no run comes out on off to meet a regulation delivery, played forward on the front foot
Sehwag to Ponting, 4 wide very wide down leg, Ponting goes to sweep it, comes round too late on the shot and it goes past Dhoni unsurprisingly, then they run three
Sehwag to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot this time
Sehwag to Clarke, no run driven out to mid-on now
Sehwag to Clarke, OUT down leg and Clarke goes for the pull, connects hard but picks out Rohit Sharma who sticks out his hands to his right and takes a firm catch
Sehwag to Symonds, 1 run full and wide down off, driven out to the covers first up
Sehwag to Ponting, 1 run
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run outside off, punched off the middle but without much power to the covers
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run bends back in from outside off, defended into the ground forward
Yuvraj to Symonds, 1 run outside off, pushed off the back foot to the covers
Yuvraj to Ponting, 2 runs outside off, driven to the covers again on the front foot, just past the diving fielder
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run a quiet defence this time
Yuvraj to Ponting, 2 runs rocks back and uses all available power to cut hard through the covers and nearly to the rope
Sehwag to Symonds, no run worked out to short midwicket off the back foot from off
Sehwag to Symonds, 1 run on leg and a touch short, turned round to midwicket
Sehwag to Ponting, 3 runs Ponting goes aerial now with a huge drive wide of mid-on and Ishant comes round to collect, just managing to keep the ball in the rope with a big dive
Sehwag to Symonds, no run turned back in from outside off, defended on the front foot
Sehwag to Symonds, no run more of the same, keeping him quiet for two balls
Sehwag to Symonds, no run outside off, forced off the back foot to mid-on
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run outside off, worked out to mid-on
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run defended on the front foot
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run width outside off, cut to point
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run can't force it away again, too good in his line and length, defended on the back foot
Yuvraj to Symonds, 1 run worked out to mid-on now
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run reaches out down leg as the ball strays down there to sweep it to fine leg
Sharma to Ponting, no run cuts in a touch from outside off, short, and is pulled out to square
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run a full delivery on off, driven out to mid-off for a quick single
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run another seamless single
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run clips from outside off through square and they look for the two
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run comes back in off the seam outside off, pushed to the covers and they look for the quick single
Sharma to Ponting, no run short ball cramps up Ponting given its awkward bounce, tucked down off the back foot
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run driven back to mid-off
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run defended on the front foot this time
Yuvraj to Symonds, 1 run cut out to point
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run driven back forward towards the bowler
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run and again
Yuvraj to Symonds, 1 run driven right back to mid-on
Sreesanth to Symonds, FOUR runs comes out of his crease to meet the ball on line with off, driving hard through the covers
Sreesanth to Symonds, 1 run very tight on off, Symonds makes room to cut back through gully - not much room there at all, really
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run straight ball on off, the batsman comes out looking for the drive and has to adjust at the last second to defend on the front foot
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run on middle and leg, good length, driven out to mid-on
Sreesanth to Ponting, no run on a good line and length, the batsman comes out of his crease and defends on the front foot
Sreesanth to Ponting, 1 run on off, a quick single to mid-on to retain the strike
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run right up there on off, Ponting presses forward defensively without too much trouble
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run and again he is solid in defence
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run room outside off, and driven out through the covers
Yuvraj to Symonds, 1 run turned in on leg, driven back out to mid-on
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run comes out and defends on the front foot
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run worked back down off the back foot to gully
Harbhajan to Symonds, no run fullish delivery on middle and leg, pushed out off the back foot to short midwicket
Harbhajan to Symonds, FOUR runs down the track and a trademark shot as Symonds drives hard and aerial straight past the bowler
Harbhajan to Symonds, 1 run driven back forward this time
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run on leg, Ponting pulls round through square for another single
Harbhajan to Symonds, 1 run waits on leg, and fast hands whip the ball - having to make all of the power themselves - in front of square
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run up there on off, and defended on the front foot
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run driven on the front foot straight to cover
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run turned in to a good length in line with off, driven out to the covers
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run turns back in, he whips it back out to the gully and there's a half-appeal
Yuvraj to Symonds, FOUR runs waited and drove inside with a fullsome aerial drive over cover
Yuvraj to Symonds, no run defended solidly on the front foot
Yuvraj to Symonds, FOUR runs another booming drive through the covers
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run across the right hander just outside off, Ponting waits and then flicks down behind gully for another single to take him on the brink of his century
Pathan to Symonds, no run defended forward
Pathan to Symonds, FOUR runs outside off, short, and pulled round strongly in front of midwicket
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run swung on to leg, clipped out to square
Pathan to Ponting, no run a back foot defence to point
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run driven forward to mid-off for his century, his second ODI ton at the SCG and his 26th overall, that coming up off 111 balls
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run goes over the top now some of the pressure if off, with a cover drive
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run cut into the ground on off this time
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run outside off, driven out to the covers now
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run outside off, a touch short, Symonds looks to pull it through midwicket, the ball going back into the ground
Sharma to Ponting, no run outside off, Ponting follows it and cuts into the ground
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run comes out and does what Symonds just did - pulled hard into the ground, not quite timing it
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run driven out to mid-on
Harbhajan to Symonds, 1 run turned out to midwicket now
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run and to midwicket again
Harbhajan to Symonds, SIX runs Symonds steps down and beasts the ball from outside off with a full-blooded shot wide of long-on
Harbhajan to Symonds, 1 run driven straight back through Harbhajan's fingers
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 wide a big wide down leg, seeing that Ponting was going to charge him
Harbhajan to Ponting, 3 runs on the legs again, tighter this time though, and Ponting tucks it off his legs very fine
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run driven out to the leg-side for an easy run
Pathan to Symonds, SIX runs slower ball outside off, short, and Symonds smashes the ball over midwicket for an entertaining fifty
Pathan to Symonds, 2 runs jumps back into the leg-side, drives out off the back foot to the covers and they get back for a comfortable two
Pathan to Symonds, 1 run thigh-high full toss, Ponting drives hard to the covers
Pathan to Ponting, 1 run
Pathan to Symonds, (no ball) FOUR runs outside off, cut hard off the back foot through point. That was also a no-ball on height so no free hit, though an extra ball
Pathan to Symonds, 2 runs outside off, driven out to mid-off
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run full ball on off and middle, driven out to long on

Sharma to Symonds, OUT the slower ball pays dividends as Ishant cleans up Symonds with one which pitches on off and turns back in to take middle and off, Symonds moving back to leave the stumps exposed
Sharma to Hussey, 5 runs a cheeky single to get Ponting back on sgtrike and Jussey would have been out if he had hit but Yuvraj's throw goes for overthrows to the short boundary
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run full toss quite high, Ponting peels off an aerial drive to mid-on
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run low one on middle and leg, whipped round behind square
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run slower ball again, dug out for a quick single
Pathan to Ponting, 2 runs over the wicket across the right hander, Ponting drives out to long off, straight, and they hare back for the second
Pathan to Ponting, no run outside off, pulled to midwicket
Pathan to Ponting, FOUR runs outside off, Ponting gets down on one knee to meet a wideish one and drive aerially over extra cover
Pathan to Ponting, no run outside off again, driven out mid-off
Pathan to Ponting, 2 runs greets a half-volley on off with a full drive through long-off and there was an easy two on
Pathan to Ponting, no run outside off, drives back into his pads, sets off, but scrambles back into his crease when he realises there isn't one on
Sharma to Symonds, no run low full toss, Symonds misses out by backing away and trying to force the cut through
Sharma to Symonds, 1 run outside off, low, sliced away down to third man off the back foot
Sharma to Ponting, no run slower ball, well disguised, Ponting was through the shot - a full-blooded drive outside off - before the ball was on to him
Sharma to Ponting, 2 runs short ball, pulled out in front of Raina at deep midwicket, taking his eyes off the ball
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run driven out to the covers this time
Sharma to Symonds, no run full toss on leg, Symonds backs away and tris to force it out to the covers but a dot results
Sreesanth to Ponting, OUT the change pays dividends as one comes in at 140kph, Ponting lashes out an aerial drive to long-off, and the leading edge is taken well by Irfan
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run outside off, pulled through midwicket
Sreesanth to Hopes, 1 run a good-length ball, pushed to the covers, Harbhajan scores a direct hit but Hopes was well in
Sreesanth to Hussey, 2 runs slower ball, Hussey digs it from outside off to long-off, good running there from the pair
Sreesanth to Hussey, 1 run pushed up there in front of middle and leg, brushed out to square
Sreesanth to Hopes, no run a swing and a miss down off, the batsman trying to take it from outside off through midwicket and getting nowhere near it
Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs wide outside off, Hussey shuffles across to meet it and drives wide of long-off
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run pushed out to mid-on from outside off
Harbhajan to Hopes, 3 runs gets away with a cross-batted swat aimed towards square but which looped over the keeper from the top edge, a slower slower ball from Harbhajan
Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs low full toss driven hard out to long-off
Harbhajan to Hussey, OUT outside off, pulled back to Harbhajan who picks it up cleanly and easily runs out Hopes at the non-striker's
Harbhajan to Hussey, OUT wide outside off, Hussey drives into the ground, Harbhajan picks up the ball and runs out Lee even despite a fumble
Well now, a hugely entertaining show from Australia whose batsmen have been under the cosh a bit. Question is, how will their bowlers now respond?
So Hussey runs out two of his team-mates a la Sangakkara in Adelaide t'other day.
Lee can't believe they took him on, he has such a good arm
Lee to Sehwag, no run
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run short and cut fiercely, runs away to deep third man
Lee to Tendulkar, no run
Lee to Tendulkar, 2 runs opened the face to third man, cutely done

Lee to Tendulkar, OUT got 'em! big wicket for Lee, fires on into middle and leg, Tendulkar tries to swish across the line but can't make contact, huge appeal from Lee and the umpire, after thinking for a while, gives it out, he's on h
Lee to Gambhir, no run

Bracken to Sehwag, no run huge appeal for caught behind, that was down the leg side and Sehwag tries to flick, some sound there for sure, it was probably a deflection off the thigh pad, umpire Harper is unmoved
Bracken to Sehwag, 1 leg bye turned away towards square
Bracken to Gambhir, 1 run tapped to the off side, that was slightly short of a length and he put it away in the gap
Bracken to Sehwag, 1 wide down the leg side, he tries to whack it across the line but can't make contact, wide called and rightly so
Bracken to Sehwag, 1 run short of a length, on the body and pulled away in front of square, Sehwag in the mood here, it seems
Bracken to Gambhir, no run full and on off, defended solidly on the front foot
Bracken to Gambhir, no run good length ball, on middle stump, that's an accurate Bracken for you, Gambhir cramped for room and can only drop it close to his body, soft hands

Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs sliding down leg again and Sehwag does the sensible thing, jumps up and uses Lee's pace to turn it down to the fine-leg fence, that was fast but Sehwag used the pace intelligently
Lee to Sehwag, no run short of a length, pushes firmly to the off side on the jump, three patrolling the cover region
Lee to Sehwag, no run fine short ball, getting extra zip off the track, 143kph that time, Sehwag is hurried onto it that time
Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs that's creamed away, full and slightly wide and he's smoked that through the covers for four, burnt the grass on its way,
Lee to Sehwag, no run short of a length and cracks it straight to point, he's finding the meat of the bat here

Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs and four more, he's on a roll here, down the leg side again, flicked away effortlessly for four more, the faster they come, the faster they go off the bat, Lee is quick but Sehwag is quicker
Bracken to Gambhir, no run short and wide, cut and a miss, edgy from Gambhir
Bracken to Gambhir, no run wide of the stumps again, taps it away from his body, straight to gully
Bracken to Gambhir, no run cut to point, Clarke is prowling there and they don't take the single
Bracken to Gambhir, no run short of a length and wide, another cut and a miss, he's having a bit of a nervy time here

Bracken to Gambhir, FOUR runs breaks the shackles, full and on off, gets his front foot forward and smacks it on the move, once he finds the gap it races away, great value for shots here in Sydney, it's such a cracking pitch this
Bracken to Gambhir, 2 runs short of a length and close to his body, he cuts anyway and picks up a couple to third man
Lee to Sehwag, no run short of a length, slightly wide, Sehwag throws the kitchen sink at it but can't make contact, the extra bounce does him in
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run short again and Sehwag smacks it towards point, super effort from Michael Clarke, who stops a certain boundary, keeps them down to a single
Lee to Gambhir, no run patted to the off side, cautious that time
Lee to Gambhir, no run
Lee to Gambhir, no run turned to square leg, they think of a single but the fielder takes a shy at the non-striker's end
Lee to Gambhir, no run short one but not as short as Gambhir anticipated, he tries to pull but can't gauge the bounce, is struck on the pads instead
Bracken to Sehwag, 1 run short of a length and straight, Sehwag backs away and tries to smash it through the off side, slightly wide of point where they picked up a single
Bracken to Gambhir, no run charging Bracken now, Gambhir is in a hurry, can't make contact to a full one that moves away a shade
Bracken to Gambhir, no run full and on off, tapped to point, fine bowling from Bracken here, he's not giving anything away
Bracken to Gambhir, no run cut away towards gully, Ponting, who is at the slips, cleans up

Bracken to Gambhir, 1 run super Symonds gets into the act, Gambhir drives to the covers and takes off but Symonds dives and pulls of a fantastic one-handed save, throws towards the non-striker's end but can't get the diirect hit, Gamb
Bracken to Sehwag, no run driven to cover
Lee to Gambhir, no run short of a length, defended off the back foot
Lee to Gambhir, 2 runs flicked behind square, too much leg-side from Lee

Lee to Gambhir, FOUR runs majestic pull from Gambhir, he's pulled that out of nowhere, short and speedy ball from Lee and that's been crunched with immense power in front of square for a four, what a cracker!
Lee to Gambhir, no run
Lee to Gambhir, 3 runs turned away towards midwicket and they pick up three, fine running there, both play for Delhi and you expect them to have an understanding
Lee to Sehwag, no run punched off the back foot, good over from India, 9 off it

Bracken to Gambhir, 2 runs full and outside off, tries to drive but only manages a top edge over the slips, now they take on Lee's arm and this is big trouble, ball fired into Gilchrist but it's Sehwag who is in trouble in the non-str
Bracken to Gambhir, no run driven to cover
Bracken to Gambhir, no run wafting outside off, beaten by the bounce and is lucky that didn't take the edge
Bracken to Gambhir, no run pushed off the front foot, on the move to cover

Bracken to Gambhir, FOUR runs down the track and, oh, that could have easily deflected back onto the stumps, races towards fine leg and Gilchrist runs after it because there's nobody else there, he dives full length towards the end, f
Bracken to Gambhir, no run cut and a miss outside off
Clark to Sehwag, no run short and wide of off stump, slower that time and doesn't bounce too much, Sehwag tries to pull but can't account for the lack of bounce
Clark to Sehwag, 1 run short of a length, turned away from middle to leg
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, tapped away towards third man

Clark to Sehwag, OUT edged and taken! short of a length and he tries to turn it to third man, faint edge and Gilchrist takes a good low catch, big appeal and it's given immediately, India in trouble here, replays showed there was a th
Clark to Rohit Sharma, no run good length ball on off, 129kph, pushed to cover
Clark to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pushed towards midwicket for a quick one

Bracken to Rohit Sharma, OUT fantastic ball to get a big wicket, short of a length, angled across the right-hander, takes the edge and Gilchrist does the rest, he was fishing aimlessly there and Bracken sent down a beauty, good pace a
Bracken to Yuvraj, 1 run good length ball, tapped to the off side for a quick single and what an effort, Symonds picks up the ball and throws down the stumps in one motion
Bracken to Gambhir, no run good length and outside off, shoulders arms, Gambhir has just seen two quick wickets fall, wonder what's going through his mind
Bracken to Gambhir, no run short of a length, outside off again, left alone
Bracken to Gambhir, no run driven crisply to cover, Hussey picks it up
Bracken to Gambhir, no run too wide this time, Gambhir can't even reach it, but the umpire lets it go, no wide called, he was lucky there

Clark to Yuvraj, FOUR runs cracking shot, forced off the back foot through the covers, really lashed into it as the ball came on to the bat and he took only three or four steps afterwards, stopping as he knew it was a four
Clark to Dhoni, 1 wide lets this one go wide down the channel
Clark to Dhoni, FOUR runs off the mark with a four, clipping one through square off his toes, the ball just outside the line of leg there
Clark to Dhoni, no run jumps into the line of off, defending down off the back foot as he goes
Clark to Dhoni, no run outside off and again he jumps into the line to defend down on the back foot
Clark to Dhoni, no run nips back in from outside off to middle and played forward, defensively
Bracken to Gambhir, no run just outside off, back of a length, cut down to the gully
Bracken to Gambhir, FOUR runs short outside off and he climbs into a huge cut through point, racing through the gap and on to the rope, shot and a half that one
Bracken to Gambhir, no run swung into the right hander in line with off, and it's defended on the front foot
Bracken to Gambhir, no run outside off, defended on the front foot now
Bracken to Gambhir, no run pushed through down off, left alone
Bracken to Gambhir, no run pushed up there in line with off, defended on the front foot
Lee to Dhoni, no run tight line, straight delivery, stump to stumps, pushed forward defensively, Ponting picks up and takes the non-striker's stumps just in case
Lee to Dhoni, no run played off the back foot into the covers
Lee to Dhoni, no run nipped back in from outside off, defended down
Lee to Dhoni, no run full ball, trademark yorker, well dug out
Lee to Dhoni, no run and another from his armoury, the straight bouncer, the batsman ducking under
Lee to Dhoni, 1 leg bye appeal for lbw which isn't even entertained by the umpire who walks off quickly, not interested
Clark to Dhoni, no run lovely delivery from Clark, hitting the deck just outside off and carrying on away with the swing, nearly taking the outside edge
Clark to Dhoni, no run turned down off the back foot, defensively, the ball rising up
Clark to Dhoni, no run slower delivery at 124kph, rolling his fingers over, and defended down
Clark to Dhoni, no run dragged down just a touch, defended off the back foot into the covers
Clark to Dhoni, 1 run a touch of width outside off, waits and cuts back behind point
Clark to Gambhir, no run right up there, defended on the front foot, no run possible
Lee to Dhoni, no run shuttles through outside off, a good lick and a good length, the batsman is so not interested his first and only movement is a leave
Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs down off, drags it a touch shorter and the batsman drives out off the back foot, jumping back as he plays the shot and that travels
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run pushed right up there, ticked off into the off-side, towards cover in fact and they race on
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run pushed down leg, the ball foisted off the thigh pad and they run a leg bye
Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs down leg, typical Dhoni, he's on to it in a flash with a flick of the wrists through fine
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run full delivery on middle and leg, driven out to mid-on
Clark to Dhoni, 1 run a fairly short ball outside off, cut hard to deep point off the back foot
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off, cut down behind point this time
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off, turned into the covers off the back foot this time
Clark to Gambhir, no run let go down off, the batsman leaves it as it shuffles through on a good length but fairly wide angle
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run a short, slower ball at 120kph, the batsman waits for it outside off and then guides it well off the back foot to third man
Clark to Dhoni, no run drags it down short and fairly wide, gets away with it this time, as the batsman drives into the covers, not quite picking it up, pushing it down into the ground
Hopes to Gambhir, 2 runs starts over the wicket, not enough angle on it and so the ball pitches in line with leg and is brushed off the pads down to fine leg for an easy single and comfortable two
Hopes to Gambhir, no run outside off this time, cut out to point
Hopes to Gambhir, no run defended on the front foot now
Hopes to Dhoni, 1 run a good line on off and fairly decent length, driven back out to mid-off
Hopes to Gambhir, 3 runs not enough anlge to the left hander again, turned off the legs in front of leg and Hogg tidies up inside the rope and on the slide
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off and pull-drives to mid-on, an awkward shot as you may expect from the description
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off, driven on the front foot into the covers
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, cut down to third man for a gentle single
Clark to Dhoni, no run nips back in from just outside off, defended straight back down on the back foot
Clark to Dhoni, no run driven out to mid-off
Clark to Dhoni, no run outside off again, this time the shot's squarer, it's pushed to point
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run guided out on the leg side this time
Hopes to Dhoni, no run great line just to say outside off, pushed through and the batsman doesn't know too much about it as there's some extra bounce too
Hopes to Dhoni, no run gave him the charge adnd was nearly run out as he drove back to Hopes who threw back at him
Hopes to Dhoni, no run slower ball tightens the batsman up, Dhoni driving back to him tamely
Hopes to Dhoni, no run nipped back in from outside off on a good length
Hopes to Dhoni, no run on the back foot, pushed down towards the covers
Hogg to Gambhir, no run defended on the front foot
Hogg to Gambhir, (no ball) a fuller delivery, driven out to mid-off
Hogg to Gambhir, FOUR runs well played, rocked from outside off and swivelled through in front of midwicket, the ball just a touch too short
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run full delivery that loops in on leg, defended on the front foot
Hogg to Dhoni, no run pushed into the covers on the front foot
Hogg to Dhoni, 2 runs forced just wide of slip, a deliberate and wristy shot
Hogg to Dhoni, no run spun right past the outside edge
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, steered off the back foot behind point
Hopes to Dhoni, 1 run on middle, got over the ball and squeezed it out to midwicket
Hopes to Gambhir, no run pushed across the left hander from over the wicket, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, left alone this time
Hopes to Dhoni, no run up there on middle, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Dhoni, no run nipped back in from outside off, looked for the single but Gambhir said no, probably sensibly
Hogg to Gambhir, 2 runs drags it short and a touch wide, the batsman cuts down behind point sending Hussey scurrying after it
Hogg to Gambhir, 3 runs outside-edged down to third man and Gambhir raises his bat for a finely crafted half-century, a resilient knock so far, from 64 balls with five fours at a strike rate of 78.13
Hogg to Dhoni, 2 runs pushed across him outside off, and forced off the back foot through the covers
Hogg to Dhoni, no run tosses this one up outside off, the ball turning back into the right hander who snuffs it out defensively
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run drives out to long-on this time for an easy single, the pair just keeping the runs ticking over
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run the wrong'un, Hogg pitching outside off and the ball curled wildly back in to the batsman who drove back out and then the throw came in to the non-striker's stumps
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, opened the face and ran the ball down to third man
Hopes to Dhoni, 1 run outside off, cut hard through point
Hopes to Gambhir, 2 runs outside off this time and driven to the covers
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run driven forward to steal a quick single
Hopes to Dhoni, no run a good ball on off, the batsman rocks on to his back foot and defends back down
Hopes to Dhoni, no run oh, so movement outside off and the batsman can consider himself lucky not to get any outside edge on that one as it nips past him cheekily
Hogg to Gambhir, no run driven out to extra cover where Symonds was waiting to cut it off
Hogg to Gambhir, no run spun in on off, keeping him quiet
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run nudges it round to midwicket for a gentle single
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run driven out to the covers now
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, rises on to the back foot and drives into the covers
Hogg to Dhoni, no run driven out to the covers on the back foot
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run starts with plenty of loop on off, driven back out to mid-on
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, cut out
Clarke to Dhoni, no run pushed out to short cover, Dhoni calls yet, and Gambhir rightly sends him back into his crease as Ponting throws in wide
Clarke to Dhoni, 1 run oh no, Pup, he drags it down and the batsman drives out straight through long-off
Hogg to Dhoni, no run pushed him right back into the crease on line with off, the batsman playing back down into the ground
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 leg bye looped in on leg, turned out square this time
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run comes out and drives aerially over the covers, the ball landing safe
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run outside off, bends back in to the right hander, who cuts back out
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run drags it down on off, driven back out to the covers
Hogg to Dhoni, no run pushed across the right hander who watches it go through to the keeper, standing on his back foot as he does so
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, turned back behind square for an easy single
Clarke to Dhoni, no run outside off, crouches over a push to the covers
Clarke to Dhoni, no run right up there on off, pushed down on the front foot
Clarke to Dhoni, 1 run drags it down short and it's pulled firmly but with poor timing to midwicket
Clarke to Gambhir, FOUR runs outside off, cut hard off the back foot behind point and Hayden went the wrong way
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run up there on off, driven out to mid-on
Hogg to Gambhir, 2 runs played well out wide of mid-on where Lee does ever so well to tidy up
Hogg to Gambhir, FOUR runs on off, a full toss which Dhoni swats out to the rope and hits a spectator on the bounce. Ouch
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run pushed forward to the covers this time
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run outside off, helps it out to long-off with a cool steer
Hogg to Gambhir, no run pushed past him outside off, the batsman cutting right over the ball, unable to connect
Hogg to Gambhir, 2 runs short and sits up nicely ready for the batsman to cut hard through point
Clarke to Dhoni, no run outside off, played hard into the ground
Clarke to Dhoni, no run outside off again, once more can't get hold of it and it goes into the ground
Clarke to Dhoni, no run pushed forward this time
Clarke to Dhoni, FOUR runs brilliance, a shot only he could play, swatting it from off his legs and fine, so fine, past the keeper with some power too
Clarke to Dhoni, 1 run pushed out for a quick single
Clarke to Gambhir, no run a calm defence to end the over
Clark to Dhoni, no run outside off, down the channel, a touch short and there's a flashing play-and-miss of a cut out off the back foot
Clark to Dhoni, 1 run banged in short on off and pulled round behind square, Hogg tidying up with his hands and tongue out
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off, pushed down without much power and they think of running but the ball ended up too close to Gilchrist to do so
Clark to Gambhir, FOUR runs outside off, and powered hard off the front foot, Gambhir advancing down and lacing the ball over long-off, quality shot
Clark to Gambhir, no run outside off, some width, and cut down behind point
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run slower one, a legcutter, which gripped on the pitch and sat up, hitting the shoulder
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run nipped back in from outside off and cut lateish down through backward point where it's winged back in

Lee to Dhoni, no run outside off, nipped back in to the right hander who defends down, Lee picks it up then pretends to throw it back in to Dhoni, Lee doing his best Cheshire Cat impersonation as a follow-up
Lee to Uthappa, 1 wide a sharp delivery, down the leg-side at thigh height and it's through the batsman almost before he has time to react
Lee to Uthappa, 2 wide outside leg, going for the booming yorker and Gilchrist's clasping mitts can only touch the ball
Lee to Gambhir, no run outside off, cut down to backward point
Lee to Gambhir, no run down leg
Lee to Gambhir, no run cut in from outside off, goes for a poke outside off
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run on middle and turned down to square
Clark to Gambhir, no run short on off, the line cramping him up, driven back out defensively
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run overpitched on off this time, the batsman driving out to mid-off
Clark to Uthappa, 1 wide a wide down leg now
Clark to Uthappa, no run a curdling appeal from Lee as the ball rapped him in line with off and there didn't seem to be too much wrong with that
Clark to Uthappa, 1 wide down leg but Gilchrist appeals for the stumping as the batsman comes well across, the other umpire having none of it
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run outside off, driven on the front foot out to deep extra cover
Clark to Gambhir, no run a good defence on the front foot this time to kill off any threat
Lee to Uthappa, no run outside off, good pace at 151kph, driven into the pads on the front foot
Lee to Uthappa, (no ball) more good wheels from Lee, clocked at 144mph, and the batsman can only leave it, but he overstepped so there's a free hit
Lee to Uthappa, (no ball) SIX runs short ball and that
Lee to Uthappa, (no ball) 1 run a no-ball again, this is becoming farcical, the batsman swipes out to mid-on meanwhile
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, driven hard out flat to Symonds at deep cover, Symonds takes the catch but it doesn't count and is winged back in
Lee to Uthappa, 1 run up there outside off, dabbed down to third man where Hogg does the work and that was a legal delivery at last
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run nipped back in from outside off, looked like a decent delivery but Gambhir manages to work it out through long-off
Lee to Uthappa, no run outside off, comes across and drives out to mid-off
Lee to Uthappa, 1 bye pushed across him outside off, and there's a mix-up from a bad throw behind the stumps to mid-on
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run outside off, pushed out to point
Clark to Gambhir, no run driven forward this time
Clark to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, cut down late to third man
Clark to Uthappa, no run up there and defended on the front foot
Clark to Uthappa, no run oh, cracker, the ball past the bastman too quickly for his liking, Gilchrist snapping up behind the sticks
Clark to Uthappa, 2 runs on middle and off, clipped off the toes to square
Clarke to Gambhir, FOUR runs outside off, full toss and spanked through midwicket, crashing shot
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run a quick single there, Uthappa now on strike
Clarke to Uthappa, 1 run another quick single
Clarke to Gambhir, 3 runs backward cut and there was a bit of poor fielding from Hogg who was chastised by Gilchrist when the ball came back in
Clarke to Uthappa, 1 run cut down to gully
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run clipped square off the legs
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, turned a touch away, the batsman leaps on to the cut to deep point and Uthappa sent him back, Gambhir looking for the strike
Hogg to Uthappa, no run on leg, cheeky as you like, and he does like to reverse sweep to Bracken at third man
Hogg to Uthappa, 2 runs two down behind the stumps
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run down on one knee, goes for a booming sweep and gets an outside edge that goes up and over to third man
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run turned off the legs behind square
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run outside off, driven to the covers
Clarke to Uthappa, 1 run pushes him on to the back foot in line with middle and leg, turned round behind square
Clarke to Gambhir, no run pushes across him, flat, and the ball's driven into the covers
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, cut hard to point
Clarke to Uthappa, 1 run pitches it just outside off, driven well to mid-on
Clarke to Gambhir, 2 runs dragged it down and Gambhir pulls hard through midwicket for a very fine hundred indeed
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run outside off, starts wide and turns wider. Back to his mark goes Hogg for another go
Hogg to Gambhir, no run wide ball, going wider
Hogg to Gambhir, SIX runs that's a better pitch but Gambhir worries not, going down on one knee and helping that long and hard over mid-on, the fielders becoming spectators, the spectators fielders
Hogg to Gambhir, no run good shot into the covers for none
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run a quick single and Uthappa takes the strike off the centurion
Hogg to Uthappa, FOUR runs the wrong' un outside off, spun away from him and that's a thumpingly lovely forward force through the covers, past the diving Clarke
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run turned into the leg-side this time
Hopes to Uthappa, no run slower ball cut in from outside off, defended on the front foot
Hopes to Uthappa, 1 run shortish ball outside off, the batsman leans over and drives out to mid-on
Hopes to Gambhir, 2 runs rolls that across him and he waits before guiding it down through fine third man, where it's just to say tidied up in time
Hopes to Gambhir, 2 runs outside off, cut hard to Hogg who throws back in, Hopes tries to backhand it on to the sticks and they run an extra at the same time
Hopes to Gambhir, no run short ball goes straight and the batsman backs away to cut it, but misses
Hopes to Gambhir, 1 run not that much room outside off, but the batsman shuffles, readjusts and finds enough width to cut down behind point
Hogg to Pathan, no run pushed on to the back foot, the batsman crouches over in firm defence
Hogg to Pathan, 2 runs drags it down short, cut out hard to deep point
Hogg to Pathan, no run outside off, wristed out
Hogg to Pathan, no run defended forward
Bracken to Pathan, 1 leg bye outside off and pushed it down behind him
Bracken to Uthappa, 1 run Uthappa lifts that over mid-on, a firm aerial shot
Bracken to Pathan, FOUR runs down the track now and Irfan sends that booming over extra cover for a full-blooded four and he deserved every run
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run nipped back in from quite wide outside off, the batsman cut that down behind point firmly
Bracken to Uthappa, 1 run slower delivery, helped down to fine leg
Bracken to Pathan, 2 runs one of his favourite cutters - and I don't mean hairdresser - whirring on to leg and pushed back out in front of square
Hogg to Uthappa, 2 runs driven over mid-off, good shot
Hogg to Uthappa, 1 run outside off, takes a full ball and reverse pulls out to point, an unusual shot if there ever was one, and there was
Hogg to Pathan, FOUR runs comes out of his crease and pulls hard wide of mid-on
Hogg to Pathan, 1 run short ball on middle, pulled round in front of square
Hogg to Uthappa, no run big swing and flashes over to square, only he completely misses the ball

Hogg to Uthappa, no run an appeal for a stumping and his front foot was back in the crease, the batsman trying to play it like a left hander. Gilchrist was, sad irony, too quick with the bails there - afterwards the batsman's foot co
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run nipped back in tightly from outside off and the batsman quickly defends down on it
Bracken to Uthappa, 1 run slower ball, overpitched outside off, and bunted out towards mid-on but there's a fielder there
Bracken to Pathan, 2 runs slower ball, again outside off, driven out towards the rope where Clarke meets it following a 20-yard dash
Bracken to Pathan, 1 run outside off, crashed hard to backward point where Hopes does well to dive and cut it off

Bracken to Uthappa, no run slower ball of a yorker, the batsman digs it out straight, very straight, and it crashes into the stumps, any fingertips from Bracken would have run out the non-striker there
Bracken to Uthappa, FOUR runs tracer bullet bisects long off and long on, a straight pull that absolutely lashes towards the ropes
Clark to Pathan, no run in on off, a good length, and driven out to straight mid-off
Clark to Pathan, no run outside off, wideish, and the ball's through to Gilchrist quickly
Clark to Pathan, 1 run outside off, cramped for room, not enough width there to flat-bat cut to Ponting at the covers who swivels and is that far from throwing down the non-striker's
Clark to Uthappa, FOUR runs shortish outside off and Uthappa wastes no time in pulling from there ub front of square. That travels
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run a good yorker, dug out past Clark and they jog through gently
Clark to Pathan, no run full ball outside off, dug out to mid-off
Hopes to Uthappa, 2 runs two feet (measurement speaking) outside off, swiped out to cow corner and Australia cannot pick up the bonus point
Hopes to Uthappa, 1 bye tries to repeat the shot but it's through him too quickly
Hopes to Pathan, no run tucked up by a well-directed ball on middle and leg, tries to pull and doesn't have the room
Hopes to Pathan, 2 runs outside off and that really is a booming drive over long-on which you think has gone all the way until Lee somehow paws at it and keeps it back in
Hopes to Harbhajan, 1 run driven out straight
Clark to Harbhajan, 1 run Harbhajan takes that from outside off with a swish to mid-on, Hussey's shy just missing
Clark to Uthappa, 1 run advances down the track and drives out to long-on, one hand coming off the bat in the effort
Clark to Harbhajan, FOUR runs outside off, he stands still and waits for the ball to come, little footwork but it doesn't matter as he cuts hard through the covers

Clark to Harbhajan, 1 run slower ball, pushed out to mid-on and they run the two, Harbhajan dives to get back in at the striker's end and he will probably be safe, meanwhile they've run one short so he only gets the single
Clark to Harbhajan, 5 wide down leg, and the ball runs on past Gilchrist, Clark searching for the yorker but just misdirecting it
Clark to Harbhajan, FOUR runs formidable shot, with plenty of power, Harbhajan steps out of his crease and flat-bats it hard straight to the boundary
Clark to Harbhajan, 2 runs pushed out now and the score advances even further
Bracken to Uthappa, no run outside off, the batsman moves backward trying to cut it out to point and has pushed back too far alas, Gilchrist takes the bails for fun
Bracken to Uthappa, FOUR runs hey now, down the track and that is very cheeksville indeed, Uthappa turning it from outside off, round the corner and picking the gap well

Bracken to Uthappa, 1 run slower one outside off and Uthappa caresses the ball out to the covers to bring up his fifty and the crowd loves it but Uthappa hardly takes the applause for his 43-ball effort, choosing instead to stay focu
Bracken to Harbhajan, 1 run outside off, Harbhajan stabs hard down to third man
Bracken to Uthappa, 1 run down the track outside off and drives out in front of midwicket, Hussey running round to tidy up
Bracken to Harbhajan, 1 run full toss wide outside off, Harbhajan cuts out to Symonds at deep cover
Lee to Harbhajan, 1 run straight on middle and Harbhajan swings out to Symonds who's now at deep midwicket
Lee to Uthappa, 1 leg bye follows him down leg and cramps him up, the ball crashing into his right shoulder as he tried to pull it
Lee to Harbhajan, FOUR runs wide down leg and he nutmegs himself in slapping it through his legs down leg
Lee to Sreesanth, no run seering yorker that was just veering down leg
Bracken to Sharma, 4 byes four byes shoot down off
Bracken to Sharma, 1 run driven out forward and there's a throw, a direct hit would have been close
Bracken to Sreesanth, 2 runs driven out to mid-off
Bracken to Sreesanth, 1 run pitched right up there, dug out to fine leg
Bracken to Sharma, 1 run runs outside off and pushes out to mid-on and they scramble through
Bracken to Sreesanth, no run wide outside off, the batsman goes to cut hard, and the ball goes on through to the keeper

Stay with me for the reaction and the Man of the Match. Ponting? While we're waiting for that, actually, in a press conference during the Chappell-Hadlee earlier this summer Ponting was miffed when, scoring runs for fun, not one of the pres
10.25pm Well that's been an excellent day's cricket at the SCG. Both sides' batting at last came good and provided some full-on entertainment, with both Ponting and Gambhir posting hundreds.
Thanks for joining me today, do come back for some more fun on Tuesday when Sri Lanka face off against India.
Australia won by 18 runs
Player of the match is Ricky Ponting, AUS
